scenario_text.value: Jeez, what crawled up your backside and died?

Let me guess: Shuuji and the teachers gave
you flak for your “cheerful” disposition?
You dunno what you’re talkin’ about.

Sure, sure, whatever you say. Come on,
it’s time to go!

And anyway, how long do you plan on following
me around?

What do you expect? Who knows what you’ll do
if I take my eyes off you, Ryo.

Clearly you’re not the type to be left to
your own devices.

Now is that any way to talk to a cute girl
like me?!

(Saki’s headed for the <color=#B41919>landmark</color>, chasing
Ryo as he continues bellyaching.)
